ov1x ov1y ov1z ov2x ov2y ov2z ov3x ov3y ov3z ow1x ow1y ow1z ow2x ow2y ow2z ow3x ow3y ow3z ou1x ou1y ou1z ou2x ou2y ou2z ou3x ou3y ou3z
v3x = ov3x - ov2x
v3y = ov3y - ov2y
v3z = ov3z - ov2z
v2x = ov2x - ov1x
v2y = ov2y - ov1y
v2z = ov2z - ov1z
w3x = ow3x - ow2x
w3y = ow3y - ow2y
w3z = ow3z - ow2z
w2x = ow2x - ow1x
w2y = ow2y - ow1y
w2z = ow2z - ow1z
u3x = ou3x - ou2x
u3y = ou3y - ou2y
u3z = ou3z - ou2z
u2x = ou2x - ou1x
u2y = ou2y - ou1y
u2z = ou2z - ou1z
nvx1 = v2y * v3z
nvx2 = v2z * v3y
nvx = nvx1 - nvx2
nvy1 = v3x * v2z
nvy2 = v3z * v2x
nvy = nvy1 - nvy2
nvz1 = v2x * v3y
nvz2 = v2y * v3x
nvz = nvz1 - nvz2
nwx1 = w2y * w3z
nwx2 = w2z * w3y
nwx = nwx1 - nwx2
nwy1 = w3x * w2z
nwy2 = w3z * w2x
nwy = nwy1 - nwy2
nwz1 = w2x * w3y
nwz2 = w2y * w3x
nwz = nwz1 - nwz2
nux1 = u2y * u3z
nux2 = u2z * u3y
nux = nux1 - nux2
nuy1 = u3x * u2z
nuy2 = u3z * u2x
nuy = nuy1 - nuy2
nuz1 = u2x * u3y
nuz2 = u2y * u3x
nuz = nuz1 - nuz2
nwyuz1 = nwy * nuz
nwyuz2 = nwz * nuy
nwyuz = nwyuz1 - nwyuz2
nwxuz1 = nwx * nuz
nwxuz2 = nwz * nux
nwxuz = nwxuz1 - nwxuz2
nwxuy1 = nwx * nuy
nwxuy2 = nwy * nux
nwxuy = nwxuy1 - nwxuy2
nvyuz1 = nvy * nuz
nvyuz2 = nvz * nuy
nvyuz = nvyuz1 - nvyuz2
nvxuz1 = nvx * nuz
nvxuz2 = nvz * nux
nvxuz = nvxuz1 - nvxuz2
nvxuy1 = nvx * nuy
nvxuy2 = nvy * nux
nvxuy = nvxuy1 - nvxuy2
nvywz1 = nvy * nwz
nvywz2 = nvz * nwy
nvywz = nvywz1 - nvywz2
nvxwz1 = nvx * nwz
nvxwz2 = nvz * nwx
nvxwz = nvxwz1 - nvxwz2
nvxwy1 = nvx * nwy
nvxwy2 = nvy * nwx
nvxwy = nvxwy1 - nvxwy2
p1a = nvx * ov1x
p1b = nvy * ov1y
p1c = nvz * ov1z
p1ab = p1a + p1b
p1 = p1ab + p1c
p2a = nwx * ow1x
p2b = nwy * ow1y
p2c = nwz * ow1z
p2ab = p2a + p2b
p2 = p2ab + p2c
p3a = nux * ou1x
p3b = nuy * ou1y
p3c = nuz * ou1z
p3ab = p3a + p3b
p3 = p3ab + p3c
lxa = p1 * nwyuz
lxb = p3 * nvywz
lxc = p2 * nvyuz
lxab = lxa + lxb
lambda_x = lxab - lxc
lya = p2 * nvxuz
lyb = p3 * nvxwz
lyc = p1 * nwxuz
lybc = lyc + lyb
lambda_y = lya - lybc
lza = p3 * nvxwy
lzb = p1 * nwxuy
lzc = p2 * nvxuy
lzab = lza + lzb
lambda_z = lzab - lzc
da = nvx * nwyuz
db = nvz * nwxuy
dc = nvy * nwxuz
dab = da + db
lambda_d = dab - dc
